long:
Meaning: something "prepared", i.e. any "apparatus" (as an implement, utensil, dress, vessel or weapon).
Usage: armour(-bearer), artillery, bag, carriage, furnish, furniture, instrument, jewel, that is made of, Ã— one from another, that which pertaineth, pot, psaltery, sack, stuff, thing, tool, vessel, ware, weapon, whatsoever.
Source: from "H3615";
